name: ROLYPOLY Goods Packaging and Shipping inc.
name_original: ROLYPOLY Goods Packaging and Shipping inc.
description:
Made in 10 days for Vimjam2 

Frederick  is the sole proprietor of ROLYPOLY Goods Packaging and Shipping incorporated. Providing expedient delivery of precious goods in questionable condition and novel parcels.

Coming on hard times you are offered a position in the main ROLYPOLY factory and as abrasive as Frederick seems, you really need the cash.

"DO NOT call me 'Fred', that's not a real name. You're FIRED"

- TEAM -

Character Design and Art by Shepherd - @MushiShepherd (Twitter/Instagram)

Programming and Additional Art by Philosopher's Stone System - @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Music, Sounds and Script by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp

This game is based on a mathematical concept in geometry known as cyclogons. Cyclogons are the curve traced by a point on a polygon that rolls across a straight line. This point is typically a vertex of the shape, but more general points can be considered as well. This game does not feature concave cyclogons despite having concave shapes, since a rolling concave polygon passes through the line as it rolls, but we can't have packages phase through the assembly line! It also doesn't feature prolate cyclogons, which describe a point outside of the rolling polygon, and a floating barcode also violates quite a few laws of physics.,
